sourceMeaningMnemonic: Your <radical>soul</radical> is going <radical>wild</radical> because you're <kanji>confused</kanji>. If you're confused, it's usually because you don't know what's going on or what to do. This makes the soul inside your body go absolutely wild!
meaningInfo: Think back to the last time you were confused. Remember how your soul felt? You were so confused it went wild and made you feel dumb and bad, like a wild person.
readingMnemonic: Whenever you're <kanji>confused</kanji>, <ja><reading>こう</reading>いち</ja> appears to offer you guidance. He's confused a lot, so he knows how to help. And knowledge offered by <ja>こういち</ja> is the best medicine for confusion.
readingInfo: Imagine being confused about Japanese, for example. In your confusion everything seems scary and wild and your soul is utterly bewildered, but then here comes <ja>こういち</ja>. He sits with you and pats your back and tries to help you stop being so confused.
